wikipedia_page.main: Noel Lloyd  (26 December 1946 – 7 June 2019) was a Welsh academic, who served as Vice-Chancellor of Aberystwyth University from 2004 to his retirement in 2011.

response: *Professor Noel Lloyd, Vice-Chancellor, Aberystwyth University. For services to Higher Education in Wales.
*Professor Noel Lloyd CBE (former Vice-Chancellor of Aberystwyth University)
*7 June – Noel Lloyd, 72, Welsh academic, vice-chancellor of Aberystwyth University (2004–2011).
*Noel Lloyd, 72, Welsh academic, vice-chancellor of Aberystwyth University (2004–2011).Tributes pour in for former university vice-chancellor
